description: Creating a serverless infrastructure with S3, Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB using CloudFormation YAML
constraints: The infrastructure must be deployed using AWS CloudFormation
A Lambda function should be set up to process S3 events
The Lambda function must have the necessary permissions to read from and write to the specified DynamoDB table
Use a single CloudFormation stack to manage all resources
The infrastructure should include an API Gateway that triggers the Lambda function
All resources must be tagged with 'Environment: Production'
Define IAM roles and policies securely using least privilege access principles
The DynamoDB table must have a primary key and a sort key, both of string type
Enable versioning for the S3 bucket used in the infrastructure
Ensure all resources are deployed in the 'us-west-2' AWS region
